sentences.english: Application of quadrupole mass-spectrometer in the transfer system for photocathode manufacturing(PC) is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了四极质谱仪在光阴极转移系统中的应用。

sentences.english: The shift to mass spectrometry-based clinical research continues to rapidly accelerate.
sentences.chinese: 向基于质谱的临床研究转变还将加速。

sentences.english: The feasibility of using quadropole mass spectroscopy to differentiate helium and deuterium was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论和测量如何利用质谱计来分氦和氘。

sentences.english: Their Mass Spectra show that they are dimers in gas phase.
sentences.chinese: 质谱研究表明这些配合物均以二聚体的形式存在。

sentences.english: The team is using an imaging system based on mass spectrometry to detect swathes of signals at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 研究团队利用质谱分析仪成像系统同时侦测众多信号。

sentences.english: Process mass spectrometers take measurements very quickly by jumping to each of the nominal mass positions.
sentences.chinese: 过程质谱仪通过跳到定义的质量位置实现快速测量。

sentences.english: A quadrupole field is often used in a mass-spectrum analyser and has never been used to analyse energy of charged particles.
sentences.chinese: 四极场常用于质谱分析，用于能量分析还没有过。

sentences.english: In the mass spectrograph the ions are focused onto a photographic plate.
sentences.chinese: 在质谱仪中，离子聚焦在感光板上。

sentences.english: Methods The different proteins were screened and identified by two-dimensional gel electrophoresis (2-DE) and mass-spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用双向凝胶电泳及质谱技术筛选差异蛋白。

sentences.english: A quadrupole mass spectrometer is used to measure the changes in impurities before and after the discharge.
sentences.chinese: 用四极质谱计来测量放电前后杂质的变化。

sentences.english: The mass spectrometric behavior of four types of Stemona alkaloids was studied.
sentences.chinese: 对4种百部生物碱的质谱行为进行了研究。

sentences.english: Sasser worm exploiting MS workstation service.
sentences.chinese: 震荡波蠕虫利用质谱工作站服务。

sentences.english: ETD machines use mass spectrometry technology to detect minute particles of explosive compounds.
sentences.chinese: ETD用质谱测定技术探测炸药混合物的微小颗粒。

sentences.english: Field desorption mass spectrometry of some oligopeptides has been described in the present paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文阐述了几个寡肽的场解吸质谱。

sentences.english: Peptide mass fingerprinting analysis of proteins is the most widely used method for protein identification.
sentences.chinese: 肽质谱指纹图分析是一种常用的蛋白质的鉴定方法。

sentences.english: In the paper, the various types of ion current collectors of Mass spectrometer were described.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了质谱计上的离子流接收器。
